number.name: Glitch_Detection_Enable
number.label: Glitch Detection Enable
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Glitch Detection Enable','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: ME_Region_OEM_Key_Manifest_Present
number.label: ME Region OEM Key Manifest Present
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Indicates whether this manifest must be present. Must be Enabled for Co-Signed Verified Boot to function.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Co-Signed_Verified_Boot_enabled
number.label: Co-Signed Verified Boot enabled
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Enables or disables Co-Signed Verified Boot feature','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Revocation_hashes_enabled
number.label: Revocation hashes enabled
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Enables or disables revocable OEM Key Hashes [0/1/2]. Should be set to Enabled for Co-Signed Verified Boot','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_hash_size
number.label: OEM Key hash size
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects hash size for OEM Key.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_0_Valid
number.label: OEM Key 0 Valid
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether OEM Key 0 is valid.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_1_Valid
number.label: OEM Key 1 Valid
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether OEM Key 1 is valid.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_2_Valid
number.label: OEM Key 2 Valid
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether OEM Key 2 is valid.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_Hash_Algorithm
number.label: OEM Key Hash Algorithm
number.params: {'value_list': {'RSA 3K SSA PSS': '0', 'RSA 3K PKCS v1.5': '1', 'ECC Secp384 r1': '2', 'ECC Brainpool384 r1': '3'}}
number.ui_params: {'description': 'OEM Key Hash Algorithm','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Key_Split_feature_enabled
number.label: Key Split feature enabled
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Key Split feature enabled','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Persistent_PRTC_Backup_Power
number.label: Persistent PRTC Backup Power
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Persistent PRTC Backup Power','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Pseudo_Timestamp_Offset
number.label: Pseudo Timestamp Offset
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Configures value of Pseudo Timestamp Offset','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_debug_authentication_required
number.label: OEM debug authentication required
number.ui_params: {'description': 'OEM debug authentication required','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Debug_Key_Revocation
number.label: OEM Debug Key Revocation
number.ui_params: {'description': 'OEM Debug Key Revocation','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Debug_Key_Revocation_Scheme
number.label: OEM Debug Key Revocation Scheme
number.ui_params: {'description': 'OEM Debug Key Revocation Scheme','Platform security': 'true'}

byte_array.name: OEM_Key_0_Hash
byte_array.label: OEM Key 0 Hash
byte_array.ui_params: {'description': 'Actual hash value of Public portion of revocable OEM Key 0.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_0_Hash_Revocation_bit
number.label: OEM Key 0 Hash Revocation bit
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether to enable or disable key hash revocation for OEM Keys 0.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_1_Hash_Revocation_bit
number.label: OEM Key 1 Hash Revocation bit
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether to enable or disable key hash revocation for OEM Keys 1.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: OEM_Key_2_Hash_Revocation_bit
number.label: OEM Key 2 Hash Revocation bit
number.ui_params: {'description': 'Separate fuse bit that selects whether to enable or disable key hash revocation for OEM Keys 2.','Platform security': 'true'}

byte_array.name: OEM_Key_1_Hash
byte_array.label: OEM Key 1 Hash
byte_array.ui_params: {'description': 'Actual hash value of Public portion of revocable OEM Key 1.','Platform security': 'true'}

byte_array.name: OEM_Key_2_Hash
byte_array.label: OEM Key 2 Hash
byte_array.ui_params: {'description': 'Actual hash value of Public portion of revocable OEM Key 2.','Platform security': 'true'}

number.name: Intel_PTT_Supported_[FPF]

number.ui_params: {'description': 'Fuse value that determines if Intel PTT is enabled/disabled on platform. This value is irreversible. Once disabled here, Intel PTT can never be enabled on the platform','Platform security': 'true'}
